description: If you thought Merino wool’s benefits—including comfort, breathability, and odor resistance—were great, you’re gonna love what else this sock brings. With their Run Zero Cushion Ankle Socks, you also get Shred Shield™ technology to reduce wear from toes, mesh zones for enhanced breathability, a Virtually Seamless™ toe for enhanced comfort, and Indestructawool™ technology for extended durability. When you’re ready to put in mile after mile of training runs, this sock will bring the comfort and durability goods.
name: Smartwool Run Zero Cushion Ankle Socks - Mens

specs.value: 47% Merino Wool, 12% Nylon, 37% Recycled Nylon, 4% Elastane
